title: DUO bot looking for a team (GOLD+)
body:
Hey all,

Gold/Plat looking for a team to play in this season coming. We play bot lane of course. We have played league together for 4 years, and have know each other since primary school. We have extremely good synergy bot lane, and yes we do make some mistakes sometimes, but we would like to better ourselves for this season.

You may add me in-game and we can have a chat/trial. We are really looking forward to this season and what the new changes have brought us.

Thanks!
